basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Carl H. Guild Jr. & Dr. Thomas E. Guild Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Dr. Carl H. Guild Jr. & Dr. Thomas E. Guild Endowed Scholarship is open to declared College of Business majors, with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA, a minimum of 15 hours completed at the time of application. Students who apply must have plans to attend law school after graduation and may not be eligible to graduate prior to Fall 2023-2024. Eligibility Requirements Declared College of Business major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Completed at least 15 hours Must have plans to attend Law School Must not be eligible for graduation prior to Fall 2024

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
